education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

responsibilities: Designed and developed cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart.
Integrated Firebase for real-time database management and push notifications.

Worked on UI/UX optimization, increasing user engagement by 25%.

education.institution: Fr. Conceicao Rodrigues College of Engineering

work_experience.description: Developed a native Android application for seamless video conferencing. Integrated the app with existing website functionalities. Developed a web application using Spring Boot for the backend and React for the frontend. The application scraped bond data from various websites and displayed it on the company's website.

At HyperVerge (Note: This description seems to belong to the Hyperverge experience), designed and optimized client onboarding workflows, ensuring seamless integration and scalability for enterprise solutions. Developed AI-driven system architectures that streamlined document verification while adhering to banking compliance norms and regulatory requirements. By automating key processes, enhanced operational efficiency, reduced friction in onboarding, and improved overall user experience.
Built a user-centric immigration website with task management, document storage, and real-time updates to streamline processes.

projects.name: Dimensionality Reduction using Metaheuristic Algorithms
projects.description: Developed a dimensionality reduction approach using metaheuristic algorithms to optimize feature selection in high-dimensional datasets. By leveraging techniques like Genetic Algorithms and Particle Swarm Optimization, improved computational efficiency while retaining essential data patterns for better machine learning performance.
